com.ardic.android.iotignite.listeners

Interface ThingListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Thing

    public interface ThingListener
    Listener for Thing objects. A Thing object can be just an actuator (doesn't generates data), or a sensor (generate periodic data) or both. It is for the ThingConfiguration and the action messages.
    Author:
    ARDIC
    See Also:
    Thing}, ThingConfiguration, ThingActionData

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onActionReceived(String nodeID, String thingID, ThingActionData thingData)
      If Thing setted as an actuator, action callback going to be handle in here.
      void onConfigurationReceived(Thing newThing)
      Return new configured Thing object.

    • Method Detail

      • onConfigurationReceived

        void onConfigurationReceived(Thing newThing)
        Return new configured Thing object. When Thing object got a new configuration. It's internally changes the config. This listener is only for notifying the application which object has been changed.
        Parameters:
        newThing -
        See Also:
        ThingConfiguration, Thing

      • onActionReceived

        void onActionReceived(String nodeID,
                      String thingID,
                      ThingActionData thingData)
        If Thing setted as an actuator, action callback going to be handle in here.
        Parameters:
        nodeID - : id of Thing's assigned node.
        thingID - : id of action.
        thingActionData - : actuator ThingActionData data.
        See Also:
        ThingActionData, Thing
